channel.title: Putting Red Fight Pits skull over head, how? [Matrix Source]
channel.description:
Hi guys, I was wondering how to put the red fight pits skull over my character? I've seen it done on the real Matrix Server, and I didn't know a command or anything for it. Thanks if you can help me out, i'd appreciate it.
Kind Regards
Gucci
